uniol.apt.adt.pn

Class PetriNet

  • java.lang.Object
    • uniol.apt.adt.extension.Extensible
      • uniol.apt.adt.AbstractGraph<PetriNet,Flow,Node>
        • uniol.apt.adt.pn.PetriNet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExtensible, IGraph<PetriNet,Flow,Node>

    public class PetriNet
extends AbstractGraph<PetriNet,Flow,Node>
implements IGraph<PetriNet,Flow,Node>
    The PetriNet is the base class for representing a petri net. With flows, places, transitions, a initial marking and final markings.
    Author:
    Dennis-Michael Borde, Manuel Gieseking

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description

      Creates a new PetriNet with the name "".
      PetriNet(PetriNet pn)
      Copies a petri net.
      PetriNet(java.lang.String name)
      Creates a new PetriNet with the given name.

        public PetriNet(PetriNet pn)
        Copies a petri net. The constructor also copies the references of the extensions.
        Parameters:
        pn - the petri net that should be copied.

    • Method Detail

      • createFlow

        public Flow createFlow(java.lang.String sourceId,
                       java.lang.String targetId)
        Creates a new flow in this petri net with the given sourceId, targetId and weight 1.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the id of the source node.
        targetId - the id of the target node.
        Returns:
        a reference object to the created flow.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if passing a null argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - thrown if one of the ids does not match a node in this petri net.
        FlowExistsException - thrown if a flow with the same source and target already exists in this petri net.
        IllegalFlowException - thrown if argument don't correspond to a place and a transition.

      • createFlow

        public Flow createFlow(java.lang.String sourceId,
                       java.lang.String targetId,
                       int weight)
        Creates a new flow in this petri net with the given sourceId, targetId and weight.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the id of the source node.
        targetId - the id of the target node.
        weight - the weight of the new created flow.
        Returns:
        a reference object to the created flow.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if passing a null argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - thrown if one of the ids does not match a node in this petri net.
        FlowExistsException - thrown if a flow with the same source and target already exists in this petri net.
        IllegalFlowException - thrown if argument don't correspond to a place and a transition.

      • createFlow

        public Flow createFlow(Flow flow)
        Creates a new flow in this petri net by copying the values from an existing arc. Also copies the references of the extensions of the given flow.
        Parameters:
        flow - the template flow.
        Returns:
        a reference object to the created flow.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if passing a null argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - thrown if one of the ids does not match a node in this petri net.
        FlowExistsException - thrown if a flow with the same source and target already exists in this petri net.
        IllegalFlowException - thrown if argument don't correspond to a place and a transition.

        public Place createPlace(java.lang.String id)

        Returns:
        a reference object to the created place.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if passing a null argument.
        NodeExistsException - thrown if an other node with the same id already exists in the petri net.

      • createPlaces

        public Place[] createPlaces(Place... placeList)
        Creates a few new places in this petri net by copying the values from the other places. It also copies the references of the extension of the given places.
        Parameters:
        placeList - a list of places to get the id and extensions from.
        Returns:
        a list of the newly created places.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if passing a null argument.
        NodeExistsException - thrown if an other node with the same id already exists in the petri net.

        Returns:

        NodeExistsException - thrown if an other node with the same id already exists in the petri net.

        public Place[] createPlaces(int count)
        Creates #count new places in this petri net with auto generated ids.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a list of the newly created places.

        public Transition createTransition(java.lang.String id)

        Returns:

      • removeFlow

        public void removeFlow(java.lang.String sourceId,
                       java.lang.String targetId)
        Removes a flow with the given source and target id from this petri net.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the id of the source node of the flow to remove.
        targetId - the id of the target node of the flow to remove.
        Throws:
        NoSuchEdgeException - thrown if there is no flow with the given target and source in this petri net.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if passing a null argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - thrown if one of the ids does not match a node in this petri net.

      • removeFlow

        public void removeFlow(Node source,
                       Node target)
        Removes a flow with the given source and target from this petri net.
        Parameters:
        source - the source node of the flow to remove.
        target - the target node of the flow to remove.
        Throws:
        NoSuchEdgeException - thrown if there is no flow with the given target and source in this petri net.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if passing a null argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - thrown if the given nodes do not belong to this petri net.

        public void removeFlow(Flow flow)

        Parameters:
        flow - the flow to remove.
        Throws:
        NoSuchEdgeException - thrown if this flow does not belong to this petri net.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if passing a null argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - thrown if the belonging nodes do not match in this petri net.

        public Flow getFlow(java.lang.String sourceId,
                    java.lang.String targetId)
        Returns a flow with the given source and target id.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - the id of the source node of the flow.
        targetId - the id of the target node of the flow.
        Returns:
        a reference to the flow with the given source and target.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - thrown if passing a null argument.
        NoSuchNodeException - thrown if one of the given nodes do not belong to this petri net.
        NoSuchEdgeException - thrown if there is no flow between the given nodes in this petri net.

      • getNode
